formalpara.title: Per day
formalpara.para: Healing Rates per day are based on a percentage of the injured person's Body Talent increased by 25.

formalpara.title: Activity Level
formalpara.para: Means the most demanding level of activity undertaken during any particular day or week.

formalpara.title: Weekly Bonus
formalpara.para: Requires a successful Fitness roll vs Injury:

sect1.para: If successful, Injury is reduced by the indicated roll.

example.title: Healing
example.screen: A person with a BOD = -3 would heal 2 points of Injury per day without healer (10% * (-3+25)) if his Activity Level was low.

para.emphasis:
Optional:
Weekly Bonus = d10-d10* + 10 + FIT - Injury

screen.emphasis:
If the person form the above example has sustained 10 Injury and he has a FIT = 3, his Weekly Bonus would be:
Weekly Bonus = d10-d10* + 10 + FIT - Injury = d10-d10* + 10 + 3 - 10 = d10-d10* + 3
